net.jforum.dao.generic

Class GenericTopicDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jforum.dao.generic.AutoKeys
      • net.jforum.dao.generic.GenericTopicDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TopicDAO
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HsqldbTopicDAO, OracleTopicDAO, SqlServer2000TopicDAO, SqlServerTopicDAO

    public class GenericTopicDAO
extends AutoKeys
implements TopicDAO
    Author:
    Rafael Steil

        public void lockUnlock(int[] topicId,

        Description copied from interface: TopicDAO
        Lock or unlock a topic.
        Specified by:
        lockUnlock in interface TopicDAO
        Parameters:

        See Also:

      • fillTopicsData

        public List fillTopicsData(PreparedStatement p)
        Fills all topic data. The method will try to get all fields from the topics table, as well information about the user who made the first and the last post in the topic.
        The method will close the PreparedStatement
        Parameters:
        p - the PreparedStatement to execute
        Returns:
        A list with all topics found
        Throws:
        SQLException

        Specified by:
        topicPosters in interface TopicDAO
